We will definitely stay here over and over again. A TOP location and accomodation with a five star breakfast till noon. Ingeborg and Winno

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good - not perfect”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed here based on all the glowing TripAdvisor recommendations. Our room had a pretty canal view and was quite large by European hotel standards. But the cleaning woman never changed our coffee cups, leaving us with sticky, dirty mugs every morning, and the bed was saggy. The downstairs lounge area is really cozy and the location is good, but I didn't fall in love with the place.

Reviews.Title: “Eureka! I've finally discovered a great hotel in the Dam”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Just stopped the one night for 50 euro's and it has to be the best little hotel I've stopped at when in the dam. It was a single room but twice the size of most other hotels, it had a kingsize bed and a lovely thick shagpile carpet. Got to be worth a visit, I'll definately be stopping again.

Reviews.Title: “our stay with them”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Last month we had a wonderful stay in this Hotel. A fantastic spot, friendly people and an excellent breakfast till noon! Since the weather was very nice we enjoyed the terrace with the beautiful view very much. This winter we will come back to Amsterdam and definitely stay in Hotel Eureka again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place!”
Reviews.Author: Esrun
Reviews.Content: We started our European vacation in Amsterdam, and this wonderful little hotel really rocked! The staff was helpful and friendly, when we decided to extend our stay in Amsterdam for another day the nice lady at the desk was glad to help out. Our room was wonderfully quaint and had a terrific view of the canal. We were on the 5th floor, but there is a small lift so you don't have to have a coronary climbling the stairs. The bathroom was private and the shower was clean and large enough to actually bathe in! Our bed was the most comfortable in all of Europe (we stayed in 4 different countries)! The room was quiet and clean - we really enjoyed staying there and slept very well every night. There is a small dining room in the hotel - and even if you don't take the offered breakfast (10 euros per person), their coffee is wonderful and should not be missed. On our first day it poured rain while we were walking to the hotel from the train station and we arrived very cold and wet - and even though it was too early for our room to be ready the landlady had us come into the dining room to sit down and dry off, then she made us wonderful cappucinos (for free) to warm us up. We will most certainly stay in this hotel again when we return to Amsterdam and will recommend it to our family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “the most friendliest little hotel in town”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: we just spent our " birthday weekend" in this lovely hotel. This was our first time in Amsterdam and we would like to say a grand THANK YOU for the worm welcome and kind service to dear Eureka-Hotel staff. WE RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL TO ALL OUR FRIENDS If we'll be back to Amsterdam , we surely join "the most friendliest little hotel in town" :-)

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding....”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have just spent 3 nights at the Hotel Eureka. We chose it on the basis of the reviews below..but it was so much better than we expected. The room was cosy, very warm and our room had the most picturesqe view we have had from any hotel window anywhere. We where situated at the front of the hotel and the river was 2-3 metres away...we could watch boats meander up and down, follow a herron finding food or watch the flakes of snow fall gently from a cold grey sky. The staff are friendly and helfpful. Breakfast is great and included AND served from 8.30 -12.00 so no worries about a late night meaning that you miss out. On our final day we had to leave early but the hotel provided us with a continental breakfast served in our room. This is a great hotel..fantastic location...good value for money and easy to get to....3 stops on the tram from central station. PS Dont MISS BOOM CHICAGO!!!

Reviews.Title: “The Best!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: An absolutely fabulous hotel. Very personable staff, family atmosphere and wonderful warm feeling. Breakfast (which was included) was great. The room right on the canal gave us a nice view at a reasonable price. Very Bed and Breakfast like. I would higly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful breakfast at Amsterdam House Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We greatly enjouyed our stay in the Amsterdam House Hotel-Eureka, especially the wonderful breakfast and we will return for sure. We can recomend it to evryone. Very centraly located and still quite location, between The Flower Market and Waterlooplein. Very clean hotel and very friendly staff will welcome you. You will realy feel like at home!!

Reviews.Title: “pleasant holiday”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We highly recomend you this warm and friendly hotel. The hotel and stuff helped to make our stay in Amsterdam so delightful. We enjoyed the hotel particularly breakfast and the ambience.

HotelInfo.Name: Amsterdam House Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 's Gravelandseveer 4, Amsterdam 1011 KM , The Netherlands
